snippet.title: Oasis Mission: Colony Sim | Gameplay trailer 0.9.0 | Steam
snippet.description:
A new version 0.9.0 of the game, has been released in Early Access.

A Sci-Fi colony and strategy sim with a complex economy, immersive logistics, and a war against the rise of the machines!

Build your colony and ensure supplies for your people. Automate industrial ships and create combat groups to defend against waves of enemies.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2658640/Oasis_Mission_SciFi_Economic_Colony_Sim/

The game features mechanics such as immersive building construction, industrial fleet creation, unit customization, citizen happiness levels, production and logistics chains, trading, politics, diplomacy, emergent objectives, and combating attacking ships and viruses.

To simplify, the game is similar to Against the Storm, Frostpunk, EVE Online (PvE), and has a bit of Dune in it.

#gameplay #colonysim #strategygames #basebuilding #simulationgames #indiegames
